item.title: Public Relations: Become a Media Star by Pitching with Video
item.description: Public Relations.Â Imagine yourself appearing on major TV news network programs, regularly. You can become the media's go-to person for your industry. Getting on major local, national and international TV news programs no longer has to be a dream for you and your organization. It can happen now. You will learn half a dozen very specific techniques on how to get more mainstream media Public Relations coverage through the strategic use of simple, talking-head YouTube videos.
